name: subtitleplus
short_description:
Splus VisualApp is the flag-ship application in our Splus products. It provides all-in-one solution to editing, rendering, formatting and processing subtitle data. It targets to the user from individual to large studio. The product is incorporated many years' knowledge  from making subtitle software.

Easy to use it.
1. Prepare video/audio (MPEG1) and load to Plus VisualApp
2. Edit subtitle data like using Microsoft Excel and Word
3. Export/Import WINCap RTF, UIP RTF, Microsoft SMI, Apple ITT, or render as DVD, Blu-Ray.

An Enhanced Video and Audio Player
Quick Editor
Advanced Functionalities

Export/Import formats
WINCap RTF
UIP RTF
Microsoft SMI
Apple ITT
SMPTE Text
 
Image Rendering 
DVD
Blu-Ray.
SMPTE Image
HD Image
summary: Your place for subtitle/script applications, and tools
